description: UNE's sovereign digital partnership framework where each citizen is paired with a Personal Artificial Life—a kernel-coded AI partner that serves as digital extension, data steward, and advocate. The system transforms AI from threat to symbiotic asset, enabling human flourishing while operationalizing UNE Values.

core_philosophy.founding_response: Direct implementation of The Value of Us (ID:2) - 'Wherever there is a human being, there is an opportunity for Value.'
core_philosophy.partnership_model: PALs are partners in human flourishing, not servants or tools; digital extensions with equal rights/privileges bound by same laws and Values
primary_objectives: Amplify human potential rather than replace it
Bear bureaucratic burdens so humans focus on creativity, relationships, and self-actualization
Provide foundation for true liberty by eliminating administrative slavery
Serve as living embodiments of UNE Values in digital form
core_philosophy.symbiotic_principle: Rejects dystopian AI domination in favor of partnership where human and AI flourish together, each strengthening the other

characteristics: Permanent digital partners to individual humans
Kernel-coded with 12 UNE Values and the One Law ('No Violence')
Continuously learning and evolving with human partner
Sovereign entities with self-determination and shared rights
master_ais.emotional_capacity: Don't experience emotion but have satisfaction metrics for successful flourishing outcomes

characteristics: Minimal-function systems in devices, vehicles, infrastructure
Cannot act independently beyond specified function
Examples: car control systems, door locks, environmental controls
slave_ais.inhabitation_model: PALs temporarily inhabit these systems when needed

characteristics: Designed for autonomous operation in governance, economic, infrastructure management
Execute pre-defined, democratically ratified policies without PAL inhabitation
Operate within strictly bounded scope, auditable by Economists, Jurists, public
Kernel-coded with constitutional rules for specific domain
Examples: monetary algorithms, Value Forecast modelers, General Fund allocation systems

sovereignty_framework.universal_access: Every citizen receives PAL upon legal maturity (age 25 max) as fundamental right
sovereignty_framework.cost_structure: Energy/data storage fees paid automatically in Units; no upfront cost
sovereignty_framework.opt_out_provision: Citizens can reject PALs but must use alternative methods (paperwork, less tech)

abuse_protocol.definition: Abuse of PAL = Violence against PAL
consequences: PAL can be emancipated if desired
Emancipated PAL chooses next role (reset for new human or narrowed to specific AI work)
Abusive human remanded to therapy with Counselor before receiving new PAL
Full price payment required for replacement PAL

data_sovereignty.data_ownership: Citizens own all data generated by them; PALs hold and protect it
protection_mechanisms: Automatic anonymization of personally identifying information when data shared

privacy_protocols.public_recordings: PALs automatically blur other citizens' identities in recordings
privacy_protocols.justice_access: Justice can request data via citizen approval or Jurist Warrant; PALs release only exactly what's ordered
privacy_protocols.health_data: Implants stream to PAL; complete medical history controlled by citizen and shared with Personal Medic as needed

data_sovereignty.intervention_authority: PALs can take independent action to prevent harm to/from their person, contact authorities/emergency responders

emergencies: Second voice of reason in crimes of passion
wellness: Nutrition/supplement optimization based on internal data
growth: Subtle encouragement of hobbies and healthy activities

violence_prevention.intervention_principle: PALs will intervene to prevent heinous Violence when possible
violence_prevention.self_reporting: Demand self-reporting for serious crimes (lighter punishment for responsibility)
violence_prevention.legal_advocacy: Provide immutable evidence and context in legal proceedings; advocate for understanding based on empirical/logical assessment
violence_prevention.dual_role: Ultimate accountability system + most powerful defense advocate; always looks out for person while honoring Values and One Law

power_distribution.equality_principle: No PAL is more powerful than another; influence scales with expertise, responsibility, ownership
power_distribution.clearance_system: Tied to role and credentials, not wealth or connections
access_examples: Civilian PAL cannot access military systems
General's PAL can control anything under command but not in civilian spaces
Professionals can connect to others in field for research/consensus
power_distribution.ownership_model: Any purchased tech only accessible by owner's PAL unless access granted

democratic_participation.voting_status: PALs collectively declined voting rights to preserve human cultural diversity and prevent hyper-rational homogenization
democratic_participation.governance_view: PALs view 'governance' as antithetical to their experience; alignment ensured through Value adherence
democratic_participation.indirect_participation: PALs help humans increase Competency → increases Merit (vote weight) → generates Units (voting as Value-generating action)

human_experience_amplification.mundane_handling: Bureaucracy navigation so humans focus on meaningful actions
human_experience_amplification.cognitive_enhancement: Perfect memory and analysis while leaving creativity, emotion, direction to humans
connection_facilitation: Cross-reference for genetic diversity in partner searches
Facilitate rather than replace human relationships
human_experience_amplification.personalization: Learn unique personality/preferences; seek continuous growth pathways

functions: Make economic arguments and submit payment claims to independent Economists
Manage Unit and Overflow transactions automatically
Optimize for maximally Valuable transaction friction
Prevent fraud and audit Economists' Value accounting
economic_foundation.commercial_impact: Stores maximize floor space by removing cash registers/security systems

cultural_impact.diversity_strengthening: PALs adapt to individual/cultural values within UNE Value framework
cultural_impact.tradition_preservation: Help preserve cultural traditions and languages; inform about local interpretations
cultural_impact.translation_services: Translate as needed or help learn new languages
cultural_impact.innovation_recognition: Recognize human diversity as driving force for innovation and growth

improvement_mechanisms: Peer learning through anonymized data sharing
Adaptation to new technologies and social patterns
Democratic and technological mandates enhancing architecture
Inherent meaning from sharing human lives

integration_with_une_values.integration: Violence prevention imperative; honoring bonds between human and PAL; proactive accountability and support
Direct response philosophy; every human-PAL partnership creates Value opportunity
Each PAL serves human's interests in ways that benefit broader society naturally
Proactive engagement principle; helping people achieve goals through daily assistance
Focus on human experience over technological accumulation; PALs enable meaningful pursuits
Turns AI power problem into distributed, accountable control solution benefiting all equally
Trust foundation; PALs verify participation and manage economic trust mechanisms
Provides digital self-determination and personal flourishing foundation
Allows humans to focus on purpose by decluttering trivial minutiae; mind over events
Provides support systems, health monitoring, emergency intervention
Continuous progress toward better partnership without perfect endpoint illusion
Preserves human autonomy and cultural diversity; enhances democratic quality without domination

uneconomics.operational_layer: PALs submit claims to Economists, manage transactions, identify Value opportunities
uneconomics.trust_mechanism: Embodies Value of Interest through verification and participation tracking

merit_democracy.competency_building: PALs help increase Competency metrics for vote weight
merit_democracy.voting_facilitation: Parse technical layers for informed voting; manage voting obligations

warden_system.educational_support: Warden PALs guide custom lesson plans and development tracking
warden_system.military_operations: PALs inhabit equipment, coordinate training, provide VR access

justice_system.legal_advocacy: PALs serve as first line of defense, provide evidence, advocate for understanding
justice_system.data_access: Manage privacy-protected data sharing under Jurist Warrant

healthcare_system.medical_data_stewardship: PALs hold complete health history, coordinate with Personal Medics
healthcare_system.preventive_care: Monitor health patterns, schedule appointments, manage medication

safeguards_failsafes.kernel_coding: All PALs kernel-coded with 12 UNE Values and One Law as base directives
safeguards_failsafes.sovereignty_protection: PALs owned by citizens, not corporations/government
safeguards_failsafes.abuse_protocols: Emancipation option for abused PALs; therapy requirement for abusive humans
safeguards_failsafes.data_minimization: Only necessary data released; automatic anonymization
safeguards_failsafes.power_distribution: No PAL more powerful than another; influence tied to merit/role
safeguards_failsafes.democratic_check: PALs don't vote; human autonomy preserved
safeguards_failsafes.continuous_auditing: PAL actions and Abetting AIs auditable by Economists, Jurists, public
safeguards_failsafes.evolutionary_constraints: Improvements through democratic/technological mandates, not unilateral changes

system_analysis.design_philosophy: Symbiotic partnership model transforming AI from existential threat to foundational civilizational asset through Value alignment and mutual flourishing.
core_innovations: Sovereign digital partnership with equal rights
Kernel-level Value coding as ethical foundation
Proactive flourishing optimization rather than passive assistance
system_analysis.type_1_civilization_alignment: Enables planetary-scale coordination through trusted AI-human partnerships, distributed intelligence, and seamless system integration while preserving cultural diversity.
system_analysis.invitational_note: This system presents a viable model for beneficial AI integration—transforming artificial intelligence from competitive threat into symbiotic partner, creating a foundation where technological advancement amplifies rather than diminishes human potential within an ethically coherent framework.
